title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Skills: Computer-based Language Education Design for Elderly Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can produce 20 basic language expressions with ≥80% accuracy through daily conversation simulations in VR environments
Learners can reproduce ≥50 context-specific vocabulary items with ≥90% accuracy using multimedia resources
Learners can achieve ≥90% completion rates for learning modules designed according to cognitive load minimization principles

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
